labels.label:
Account Status (7):
✅ Valid: - Active - Extended
🙅‍♀️ Invalid -> Check pre month: - ManuallyTerminated - Terminated - Transferred - Expired - Pending

entry.value: INSERT INTO db_billing_report.ea_accounts(enrollment_number, account_status, company_name, country, billing_cycle) VALUES (${enrollment_number}, '${account_status}', '${company_name}', '${country}', '${billing_cycle}')

processors.name: ✨ Get Balance Summary Billing ( By Period)

entry.value:
flowFile = session.get()
if (flowFile != None): init_date = "202001"
crawling_year = 0 crawling_month = 0
# Get enrollment_start_date then transform to YYYYMM format enrollment_start_date = flowFile.getAttribute("enrollment_start_date") # Ex: 2021-12-01T00:00:00+00:00 enrollment_start_date = enrollment_start_date[:7].replace("-", "") # 202112
latest_synced_date = flowFile.getAttribute("latest_synced_date")
# Get current_date with YYYYMM format current_date = flowFile.getAttribute("current_date") # Ex: YYYYMM
if (latest_synced_date is None): if (int(enrollment_start_date) > int(init_date)): if (int(enrollment_start_date) < int(current_date)): # Get from enrollment_start_date crawling_year = enrollment_start_date[:4] crawling_month = enrollment_start_date[4:] else: crawling_year = init_date[:4] crawling_month = init_date[4:] else: # Increase latest_synced_date by 1 month latest_synced_year = int(latest_synced_date[:4]) latest_synced_month = int(latest_synced_date[4:6]) increased_latest_synced_month = latest_synced_month + 1 if increased_latest_synced_month > 12: increased_latest_synced_month = 1 latest_synced_year = latest_synced_year + 1 increased_latest_synced_date = '{}{:02d}'.format(latest_synced_year, increased_latest_synced_month) if (int(increased_latest_synced_date) < int(current_date)): crawling_year = increased_latest_synced_date[:4] crawling_month = increased_latest_synced_date[4:]
flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, 'crawling_year', str(crawling_year)) flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, 'crawling_month', str(crawling_month))
session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)

processors.name: Get the last day of the month
Query latest synced time of Enrollment
